scriptLines:
query: '/* Rev 1 - Set to look back at last 7 days.  Will be running weekly.  Only thing Revenue Analytics might want is unit cost and unit price.  TD 3-16-23
*/
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.trx_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.trx_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', round(-((x.unit_cost / x.unit_price) -1),2) as 'Margin',  'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                           else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  
  x.trx_qty > 0 and x.ship_debit_amt = 0 and x.unit_cost <> '0' and x.unit_price <> '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union
-- Regular shipments (cost and resale are both greater than zero) with a ship and debit
select  x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', ((x.unit_cost -(x.ship_debit_amt / x.trx_qty))  * x.trx_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.trx_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', round(-(((x.unit_cost - (x.ship_debit_amt / x.trx_Qty)) / x.unit_price) -1),2) as 'Margin',  'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                           else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.trx_qty > 0 and x.ship_debit_amt <> 0 and x.unit_cost <> '0' and x.unit_price <> '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union
-- Shipment quantity is greater than zero, unit price is greater than zero, cost is zero, margin is 100% on all lines
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.trx_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.trx_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', '100' as 'Margin', 'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                         else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.trx_qty > 0 and x.unit_cost = '0' and x.unit_price <> '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and  x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union
-- Shipment quantity is greater than zero, unit price is zero, cost is greater than zero, margin is 0% on all lines
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.trx_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.trx_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', '0' as 'Margin', 'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                           else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.trx_qty > 0 and x.unit_cost > '0' and x.unit_price = '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union
-- Shipment quantity is zero, margin is 0% on all lines, for reporting purposes only
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.trx_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.trx_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', '0' as 'Margin', 'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                           else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
left join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.trx_qty = 0 and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union 
-- Credit where order quantity is less than zero, both price and cost do not equal zero 
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.ord_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.ord_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', round(-((x.unit_cost / x.unit_price) -1),2) as 'Margin',  'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                          else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
left join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.ord_qty < 0 and x.unit_Cost <> '0' and x.unit_price <> '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union 
-- Credit where order quantity is less than zero, price is zero but unit cost is not zero, margin is 0% on all lines 
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.ord_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.ord_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', '0' as 'Margin',  'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                         else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
left join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.ord_qty < 0 and x.unit_Cost <> '0' and x.unit_price = '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
union 
-- Credit where order quantity is less than zero, cost is zero but unit price is not zero, margin is 100% on all lines 
select x.inv_trx_rec 'Inventory Transaction Record', x.order_no 'Order Number', x.lin_no 'Order Line', x.trx_date 'Invoice Date', c.cust_name as 'Customer Name', c.cust_no as 'Customer Number',
                            case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                              when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                              when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                       else 'Other' 
                                                       end as 'Customer Classification',
s5.slsman_nam 'Salesman',  case when  h4.ord_type = 'C' then 'Credit Order' else 'Sales Order' end as 'Order Type',  x.item_no as 'SKU', x.manu_no as 'Manu No', x.vend_no as 'Vend No', s.code_desc as 'Product Type', 
                                               case when d6.pkg_label = 'NONE' then i.uom
                                                                when d6.pkg_label = '' then i.uom
                                                                  else d6.pkg_label end as 'Ship UOM'
                                                , h.st_city as 'Ship-to City', h.st_state as 'Ship-to State', h.st_cntry as 'Ship-to Country','Electro' as 'Business line', x.trx_qty 'Transaction Quantity', (x.unit_cost * x.ord_qty) as 'Extended Inventory Cost', (x.unit_price * x.ord_Qty) as 'Extended Resale', '100' as 'Margin',  'USD' as 'Currency', case
                           when y.item_no is NULL then 'Ad-hoc'
                           else 'LTA'
                           end as 'LTA vs. Ad-hoc', case
                           when w.stk_item = 'Y' then 'Stocking'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' then 'Resale'
                           else 'Purchasing'
                           end as 'Inventory type',case
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no <> 'ELEENT' then 'Value-Add Connector'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat = 'CAB' then 'Cable Assembly'
                           when x.vend_no like '%SHOP%' and x.manu_no = 'ELEENT' and i.prod_cat <> 'CAB' then 'Other Value-Add Assembly'
                          else 'Non-VA'
                           end 'Distribution Type'
from inv_trx x
join ord_Detl d6 on d6.order_no = x.order_no and d6.lin_no = x.lin_no
join ord_hedr h4 on h4.order_no = x.order_no
join slsman s5 on s5.slsman_no = x.slsman_1 
join customer c on c.cust_no = x.cust_no
join item i on i.item_no = x.item_no and i.manu_no = x.manu_no
join codes s on s.code_id = i.prod_cat and s.code_type = 'P'
left join shp_hedr h on h.ship_no = x.ship_no
left join (select  distinct (d.item_no+d.manu_no+h.cust_no) as 'contract_identifier', h.cust_no, d.item_no, d.manu_no
               from ord_detl d
                     join ord_hedr h on h.order_no = d.order_no and h.ord_type = 'N'
                     where d.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'V') y on y.cust_no = x.cust_no and y.manu_no = x.manu_no and y.item_no = x.item_no
left join (select distinct (w.item_no+w.manu_no) as 'stocking_identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no, w.stk_item
                     from itm_whse w
                     where w.stk_item = 'Y') w on w.item_no = x.item_no and w.manu_no = x.manu_no
where  x.ord_qty < 0 and x.unit_Cost = '0' and x.unit_price <> '0' and x.trx_type = 'S' and x.cust_no not like '%SHOP%' and x.trx_date between ((getdate() - 7)) and ((getdate()))
',

query: 'select i.item_no 'SKU', i.manu_no 'Manu No', i.item_desc 'Item Description', i.prod_cat 'Product Category', c.code_desc 'Product Category Description', i.price_cat 'Price Category', i.uom 'UOM', i.landed_cost 'Landed Average Cost', i.last_cost 'Last Cost', i.new_Cost 'New Cost',  d.max_cost 'On Order Cost', i.last_sold 'Last Sold', i.last_recd 'Last Received', i.man_notes 'Mandatory Notes', I.inactive 'Inactive'
from item i
join codes c on c.code_id = i.prod_cat and c.code_type = 'P'
left join (select d.item_no, d.manu_no, max(unit_cost) 'max_cost'
             from po_Detl d
             join po_hedr h on h.po_no = d.po_no
             where h.shop_po = 'N' and h.status <> 'V' and h.status <> 'C' and d.bal_of_ord > 0 and d.status <> 'V' and d.status <> 'C'
             group by d.item_no, d.manu_no) d on d.item_no = i.item_no and d.manu_no = i.manu_no
order by i.item_no asc

',

query: '/*Rev 1.  Might want country name added too instead of just code.  5-2-23
*/
select c.cust_no 'Cust No', c.cust_name 'Cust_Name', c.cust_addr1 'Address 1', c.cust_addr2 'Address 2', c.cust_addr3 'Address 3', c.cust_addr4 'Address 4',
        c.cust_city 'Cust City', c.cust_state 'Cust State', c.cust_zip 'Cust Zip', c.cust_cntry 'Country', c.slsman_1 'Salesmen 1', s1.slsman_nam 'Salesmen 1 Name', 
          c.slsman_2 'Salesmen 2', s2.slsman_nam 'Salesmen 2 Name', c.cust_type 'Cust Type Code', 
          case when c.cust_type like 'A%' then 'Subcontractor'
                                                            when c.cust_type like 'B%' then 'OEM'
                                                            when (c.cust_type like 'C%' or c.cust_Type like 'D%') then 'Aftermarket'
                                                            when c.cust_type like 'E%' then 'Government'
                                                            when c.cust_type like 'F%' then 'Franchised Distributor'
                                                            when c.cust_type like 'G%' then 'Broker/Disty Not Franchised'
                                                                           when c.cust_type like 'I%' then 'Intercompany'
                                                               else 'Other' 
                                                               end as 'Customer Type Description', C.active 'Active' 
from customer c
join slsman s1 on s1.slsman_no = c.slsman_1
join slsman s2 on s2.slsman_no = c.slsman_2',

query: '/* Using 250 pcs for both kitting and VA items' reorder qty per Mitch's email on 5-2-23, subject line "Board update".  For kits, might add the component 
    with the highest stocking qty as the reorder level down the road. - Ty 5-2-23
*/
select i.item_no 'SKU', i.manu_no 'Manu No', w.vend_no 'Vend No', case when w.min_ord_qty = '0' then x.min_ord_qty else w.min_ord_qty end as 'Stock Reorder Qty'
from item i
join itm_vend w on w.item_no = i.item_no and w.manu_no = i.manu_no
       join (select w.item_no, w.manu_no, v.vend_no, v.min_ord_qty
                from itm_Whse w
                join itm_vend v on v.item_no = w.item_no and v.manu_no = w.manu_no
                where w.stk_item = 'Y' and reorder_lvl > 0 and v.prim_vend = 'Y') x on x.item_no = i.item_no
where w.prim_vend = 'Y' 
union
select i.item_no, i.manu_no, 'SHOP', '250'
from item i
join (select distinct concat(d.kit_item, d.kit_manu) 'ident', d.kit_item, d.kit_manu
          from kit_Detl d
          join (select d.kit_item, d.kit_manu, d.kit_REv_no, count(*) 'stock_kit'
              from kit_Detl d
              join   (select distinct concat(w.item_no,w.manu_no) 'identifier', w.item_no, w.manu_no
                           from itm_whse w
                           where  stk_item = 'Y') e on e.item_no = d.item_no and e.manu_no = d.manu_no
              group by  d.kit_item, d.kit_manu, d.kit_REv_no) x on x.kit_item = d.kit_item and x.kit_manu = d.kit_manu and x.kit_rev_no = d.kit_rev_no
          join item i on i.item_no = d.kit_item and i.manu_no = d.kit_manu
          join kit_hedr h on h.item_int_id = i.item_int_id and h.kit_rev_no = d.kit_rev_no
group by d.kit_item, d.kit_manu, d.kit_rev_no, h.qk_rev, x.stock_kit
having count(*) = x.stock_kit) m on m.kit_item = i.item_no

',

query: 'select dbo.fnget_lot_cost(v.lot_no) 'Lot Cost', v.lot_no 'Lot No', v.item_no 'SKU', v.manu_no 'Manu', v.whse_cd 'Warehouse', v.orig_qty 'Original Quantity', 
          v.bal_of_lot 'Balance of Lot', v.dm_qty 'DM Quantity', v.qty_commit 'Quantity Committed'
from lot_hedr v
where (v.bal_of_lot > 0 or v.dm_qty > 0)',
